statements: SELECT * FROM portfolio_managers;
SELECT manager_id, manager_name FROM portfolio_managers WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_managers ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT manager_id, investment_amount FROM portfolio_managers WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT manager_id, manager_name, investment_amount FROM portfolio_managers WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT manager_name, investment_amount FROM portfolio_managers ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, manager_name;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_managers WHERE investment_amount > 5000;
SELECT manager_id, manager_name, investment_date FROM portfolio_managers WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_managers WHERE investment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND investment_amount < 1000;
SELECT manager_id, manager_name, investment_amount FROM portfolio_managers ORDER BY investment_date ASC, manager_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioManagers;
SELECT name, email FROM PortfolioManagers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM PortfolioManagers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPerformance WHERE investment_return > 0 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT investment_name, investment_return FROM InvestmentPerformance WHERE manager_id = 2;
SELECT name, email FROM PortfolioManagers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPerformance WHERE investment_return > 0.05 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT id, investment_name, investment_return FROM InvestmentPerformance WHERE manager_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY investment_return DESC, investment_date ASC;

SELECT pm.name, ip.investment_name, ip.investment_return FROM PortfolioManagers pm JOIN InvestmentPerformance ip ON pm.id = ip.manager_id WHERE ip.investment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT MAX(investment_return) AS max_return, AVG(investment_return) AS avg_return FROM InvestmentPerformance WHERE manager_id = 2 GROUP BY manager_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_managers;
SELECT manager_id, manager_name FROM portfolio_managers WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT manager_name, manager_email FROM portfolio_managers ORDER BY manager_name DESC;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT data_id, investment_id, data_date, data_value FROM performance_data ORDER BY data_date;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_managers;
SELECT manager_name, manager_email FROM portfolio_managers WHERE manager_id = 1;

SELECT investments.investment_name, investments.investment_amount, portfolio_managers.manager_name FROM investments JOIN portfolio_managers ON investments.manager_id = portfolio_managers.manager_id WHERE investments.investment_amount > 1000;

SELECT performance_data.data_date, performance_data.data_value, investments.investment_name, portfolio_managers.manager_name FROM performance_data JOIN investments ON performance_data.investment_id = investments.investment_id JOIN portfolio_managers ON investments.manager_id = portfolio_managers.manager_id WHERE investments.investment_amount > 500 AND performance_data.data_value < 10;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PortfolioManagers;
SELECT manager_name, email FROM PortfolioManagers ORDER BY manager_id DESC;
SELECT investment_name, amount FROM Investments WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT performance_date, return_rate FROM InvestmentPerformance WHERE investment_id = 101 ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT asset_name, value FROM Assets WHERE investment_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioManagers;
SELECT investment_name, amount FROM Investments WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT manager_name, email, phone_number FROM PortfolioManagers WHERE manager_id = 2;
SELECT asset_name, value FROM Assets ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT i.investment_name, ip.performance_date, ip.return_rate FROM Investments i JOIN InvestmentPerformance ip ON i.investment_id = ip.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_managers ORDER BY manager_name ASC;
SELECT fund_name, asset_name, asset_value FROM investment_funds JOIN investment_assets ON investment_funds.fund_id = investment_assets.fund_id;
SELECT account_name, manager_name FROM client_accounts JOIN portfolio_managers ON client_accounts.account_manager_id = portfolio_managers.manager_id;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_assets WHERE asset_value < 5000;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_managers;
SELECT manager_name, manager_email FROM portfolio_managers WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT fund_name, asset_name, asset_value FROM investment_funds JOIN investment_assets ON investment_funds.fund_id = investment_assets.fund_id;
SELECT account_name, manager_name FROM client_accounts JOIN portfolio_managers ON client_accounts.account_manager_id = portfolio_managers.manager_id;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE asset_id = 1;
